mapper.insert: insert into disappearReport values(disappearReport_seq.nextval, #{disappearDate}, #{areaList}, #{disappearArea}, #{tel}, #{kind}, #{gender}, #{neuter}, #{age}, #{furColor}, #{feature}, #{et}, null, #{writer}, default, #{ip})
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number()over(order by seq desc) as rown, disappearReport.* from disappearReport) where rown between #{start} and #{end}
